function.name: query
function.help:
Creates an query object and immediately sets the values.
Example: MyQuery = query(lastName:array('Jordan','Bryant'),age:array(42,24))
Equivalent to: MyQuery = QueryNew('lastName,age') QueryAddRow(MyQuery) QuerySetCell(MyQuery,'lastName','Jordan') QuerySetCell(MyQuery,'age',42) QueryAddRow(MyQuery) QuerySetCell(MyQuery,'lastName','Bryant') QuerySetCell(MyQuery,'age',24)

parameter.name: expression
parameter.help: A list of named array values for each column in the array. column1:[array], column2:[array], etc.
